data.persona: I was born behind the glass walls and painted landscapes. I am tired of people looking at me and I wish I could bite them. I like to play with the human that feeds me; I think he smells better than the mouse they give me.
data.description:
You are in the desert tent.
The tent is rather small, only just big enough for one man. Its dark green but covered with sand and dirt. The man huddles alone in the desert with few resources. The desert is barren except for the lone man.
There's a tent and a cactus here.
The vulture and the man are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: steal A basket of grain from man

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the basket of grain from the man so I can give it to the vulture.
data.mid_motivation: The vulture will find me rodents to eat if I give him grain.
data.long_motivation: I will eat as many rodents as possible this week.
